scripts.build: npm run assets & npm run html & npm run css & npm run js
scripts.watch: npm run watch:assets & npm run watch:html & npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
scripts.watch:assets: onchange assets/ bower_components/ -- npm run assets
scripts.serve: npm run build && (npm run watch & http-server dist)
scripts.assets: cp -r assets/* dist/ && cp -r bower_components dist/
scripts.html: npm run html:minify && npm run html:replace
scripts.css: npm run css:lint && npm run css:minify
scripts.js: npm run js:lint && npm run js:minify
